```{r load_packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath("../"))
```

```{r load_data include = FALSE}
knit("wrangle/cps.Rmd")
knit("wrangle/nc_wrangle.Rmd")
knit("tidy_cces/tidy_cces.Rmd")
```

```{r cps}
ggplot(cps, aes(FAMINC)) +
  stat_count() +
  facet_wrap(~YEAR) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(title = "CPS reported family income",
       x = "Family income",
       y = "Count")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 1, hjust = 1))
```
